alert.note: Alert for Union (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 03 at 1:04AM CST until March 03 at 2:00AM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Union County in south central Arkansas... Northern Jackson Parish in north central Louisiana... Union Parish in north central Louisiana... Eastern Claiborne Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northeastern Bienville Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Lincoln Parish in north central Louisiana... * Until 200 AM CST. * At 104 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Norphlet to 8 miles northwest of Bernice to near Arcadia, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ruston, El Dorado, Grambling, Smackover, Norphlet, Huttig, Junction City, Farmerville, Arcadia, Bernice, Strong, Calion, Wesson, Lisbon, Urbana, Lawson, Cooley, Lapile, Dubach and Choudrant. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 AM CST for south central Arkansas...and north central and northwestern Louisiana. Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure.
